item.description:
November 19TH, 2011 8:30AM - UCONN FOOTBALL Game vs. Louisville Cardinal. Meet @

OFFICIAL MEETING PLACE FOR NOVEMBER 19TH EVENT - Wendy's Restaurant - (back parking lot) 303 Main St. East Hartford, CT 06118 <-----official meeting place for event - 8:30AM SHARP!!! We will meet at this parking lot, load all gear, equipment, and signs into my truck/and other vehicles if needed, then proceed into stadium parking lot together. Any late comers are advised(without getting caught) to park in Cabella's Sporting Goods parking lot (475 East Hartford Blvd. North
East Hartford, CT), then walk over to stadium (SW) parking lot to meet up with us. PLEASE MAKE IT OUT TO THIS EVENT, AND PLEASE BE ON TIME - THANK YOU - questions, contact me (860) 899-4818 - Doug
item.name: UCONN FOOTBALL - SIGN BOMB - SIGN WAVE - Material Hand Outs (2nd edition)
